text: The 1976/77 NTFL season was the 56th season of the Northern Territory Football League (NTFL). Waratah have won there 13th premiership title while defeating St Marys in the grand final by 13 points. ==Grand Final== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left;" |- style="background:#efefef;" ! Premiers ! GF Score ! Runner-up |- | Waratahs | 10.15 (75) - 8.14 (62) | St Marys |} ==References== Category:Northern Territory Football League seasons NTFL
title: 1976/77 NTFL season
